question: Which country is hosting the world's first Muslim yoga camp?
explanation: The world\'s first Muslim yoga camp has started at Kanva Ashram in Kotdwar town of Uttarakhand on 20th November & will conclude on November 24. Approx 500 Muslim men and women from different countries are participating in the event.  The event  will send a healthy message to the world that yoga does not belong to a particular religion and is beneficial for entire humanity.
